## IDocument interface

A cross-environment interface that covers the method supported by both DOM (as document) and canvas-cleave (as document).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDocument 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createElement(el)](./canvas-cleave.idocument.createelement.md) | Create an element. Only "canvas" is supported by both DOM and canvas-cleave. |
